title: The Chronicle of Frank Bell: The Mentor of Might

story.text: Frank Bell, long-time tutor and mentor, discovers a strange, glowing amulet in the corner of the local library. When he touches it, he feels a surge of energy and newfound vitality.
With his new powers, Frank realizes he can impart knowledge instantly by touch. Excited, he tests this by helping a struggling student grasp complex mathematics instantly.
News of Frank’s abilities spread, and he becomes a local celebrity. He uses his powers to help students prepare for upcoming exams, ensuring their success.
Frank encounters a mysterious figure who warns him that the amulet’s powers are sought after by a malevolent entity. He urges Frank to be cautious.
The malevolent entity confronts Frank, attempting to steal the amulet. A battle of wits ensues, where Frank uses his deep knowledge to outmaneuver his opponent.
Exhausted but victorious, Frank decides the amulet is too powerful to be used lightly. He chooses to only use it when absolutely necessary, preserving the balance.
Frank spends a quiet day reflecting, tutoring a few loyal students without the amulet's assistance, and reaffirms the value of hard work and personal connection.

ending: With great power comes great responsibility, and Frank Bell chooses to wield his wisely, blending traditional mentoring with moments of magical aid.
moral: True power lies in empowering others.
